metadata.title: CVE-2021-0929 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In ion_dma_buf_end_cpu_access and related functions of ion.c, there is apossible way to corrupt memory due to a use after free. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-187527909References: Upstreamkernel

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
